Entries.SandyComesToTown: I'll see you next Sunday, sweetie!$h
Entries.SandyEmilyDating: Oh @! I'm so happy. Emily and I talked and they feel the same way about me.$h

Entries.BusStop: {{Random:Hi, @! How's %farm Farm doing?#$b#I'll be sure to take a peek on my way back home.$h&&Do y'all have a farmer's market here? I'd love to buy some of your produce directly.$h&&Are you growing any flowers on your farm right now, @? I'd love to take a look.&&You have a {{PreferredPet}} right, @?#$b#I'd love to stop by the farm and say hello to %pet.$h&&Ugh, the fumes from the bus are terrible. Emily's always saying we should switch to electric. I get what they mean now.$s|inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.Saloon: {{Random:Pierre keeps trying to tell me how to do business, but why would I listen to a man who doesn't even plan ahead and sell out-of-season seeds?&&I think Pierre's had a bit too much to drink.$h&&Isn't it funny how Emily always says they work part-time when they work here seven days a week?$h&&The food here is amazing. No wonder everyone comes here on Fridays. I'm going to have to coax Gus into giving me some of his secret recipes.$h&&Do you know why Clint keeps glancing over here?$s#$b#He could just say hello, I don't bite.$h&&What are you having, @? My treat!$h|inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.winter_Tue2: You know, Emily is a really talented designer. They sew all of my clothing for me.$h

Entries.summer_Wed10: I dropped by Emily's the other day and made Tom Kha soup for them. They really loved it.$h
Entries.fall_Thu10: Emily and I don't have any longterm plans yet. We're just taking it day by day, though every day looks brighter than the last.
Entries.winter_Mon10: I've already started planning Emily's Winter Star gift. I know they're going to love it.
Entries.spring_26: {{Random:Tomorrow is Emily's birthday! I bought them a beautiful aquamarine necklace.&&Tomorrow is Emily's birthday! Don't tell them, but I bought them a beautiful ruby bracelet.$h|inputSeparator=&&}}
Entries.winter_24: I can't wait to show Emily what I got them for the Feast of the Winter Star!$h

Entries.13609014/f Sandy 1750/f Emily 1500/e 136: distantBanjo/8 5/farmer -30 -30 0 Sandy 2 5 2/skippable/pause 1000/warp farmer 4 8 0/playSound doorClose/pause 200/textAboveHead Sandy "Em--? Oh, it's you..."/pause 800/move farmer 0 -3 3/faceDirection Sandy 1/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Sandy "For a second, I thought you were Emily, that's all.$s"/pause 1000/emote Sandy 28/pause 200/question null "#Is everything okay, Sandy?#What am I, chopped liver?"/emote Sandy 60/pause 1000/splitSpeak Sandy "Sure, everything's peachy...$s~No, of course not, @...$s"/pause 500/emote Sandy 28/pause 200/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 200/textAboveHead Sandy "*sigh*"/pause 500/speak Sandy "Can I confide in you, @?$s"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Sandy "It's been really nice... being back in the Valley... hanging out with new people... reconnecting with Emily...#$b#I'd almost forgotten how much they mean to me..."/pause 200/emote Sandy 60/pause 200/speak Sandy "And I think if you were to ask them, they'd say I'm like family to them... $s"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sandy 3/speak Sandy "...except, well, I don't really think of *them* as family...$s"/pause 100/emote Sandy 28/faceDirection Sandy 1/pause 200/speak Sandy "I think of them as more than a friend...$s#$b#Do you understand what I'm saying, @?$s"/pause 300/jump farmer 4/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 300/speak Sandy "But I haven't told them because we've been friends for so long!$s#$b#If they don't feel the same way, it would ruin everything.$s#$b#I don't think I'd be able to show my face in Pelican Town again. It would be too awkward and painful.$s"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 300/question null "What would you do in my shoes?#I would tell them.#You have to do what's best for you..."/pause 200/emote Sandy 28/speak Sandy "Really?...$s#$b#I guess I'll have to think about this some more.$s#$b#Promise me you won't say anything to Emily regardless of what I decide...?$s"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 300/emote farmer 40/speak Sandy "Thanks, sweetie."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.spring_27.embday: Hi, sweetie! It's Emily's birthday today! Have you wished them a happy birthday yet?#$b#*whispers* They really like gems.
